website_summaries.verdict: Unusual, yet innovative gardening gloves with claws on each hand for easy digging, planting, and repotting.
pros: Gloves are close-fitting and puncture-resistant with 4 durable ABS plastic claws on each hand
Users say they're comfortable and breathable, even when worn for long stretches
cons: Claws are fixed in place and get in the way for most non-digging tasks

customer_reviews.title: Be the best at what you do
customer_reviews.text: With the fury of an angry badger, I dug and tore at the soil with reckless abandon. Roots, rocks, grubs, all fell to my wrath. As I dug deeper I could feel the end near. A shallow pit, perfect for my plans. The hibiscus is growing great and these also helped condition the soil! Do recommend! If you have anger issues as well, these could save on therapy. If you are scared of intruders, make them scared of you. If you have rocky soil, rock out with these.
customer_reviews.author: Burly

customer_reviews.title: Terrible in solid/rocky soil
customer_reviews.text: These work great if you have just worked the soil, otherwise your fingers better be buff! When spring hit I wanted to plant some flowers and grabbed these babies out. However it was a great struggle as I attempted to plunge my hands into the hard dirt. After working up the soil with a shovel they worked fine, but that defeated the purpose of buying these. They work fine as gardening gloves hence the 3 star.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Holeman

customer_reviews.title: Great but needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: I used these claw gloves for the first time today. They were awesome for the first two hours and then the claws started coming off. I planted 7 plants and then lost one claw in one of the planter boxes (I have not found the claw yet). While planting an additional three plants the second and third claws came off but just on the right hand glove. The left hand glove still has all four claws. Overall they were awesome while they lasted but I won’t buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Love the gloves!
customer_reviews.text: These are truly the best gloves for not only the garden, but any grimy slimy job that needs to be done. I raise 5 ducks and they are not the neatest pets. Cleaning their coop and little pond has been a drag before these gloves. My hands stay dry even when submerged! The fit is very comfortable and the gloves without the claws are great for cleaning out under the mower without fear of getting cut on the blade. I am glad I bought these gloves- great for the price and I think they will last many seasons.
customer_reviews.author: alice davison

customer_reviews.title: so easy!
customer_reviews.text: Saw this item highlighted in a flash sale email from an iffy source, so I decided to come see if it's on Amazon. Sure enough, Amazon had it, similar price, but Amazon had it with "claws" on both hands, so better value this way. Yesterday I put in our tomato plants and it was so easy! A lot of times I end of alternating between tools and my fingers, this gave both together! Awesome gadget. (Plus my son thinks it's monster gloves, he's trying to scare other kids with it, not that anyone's really scared. It's more of a curiosity than a scare.)
customer_reviews.author: Vichna Belsky

customer_reviews.title: I'm delighted.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these on a whim, thinking to use them for a costume. In fact, they are much sturdier and flexible than expected; they are a real garden glove. I haven't tried clawing around in the dirt, but the tough plastic finger caps are deep enough to provide leverage for picking things up. They are also surprisingly comfortable. I have somewhat soft, thick hands, and I could put them on with just a slight feeling of support that made them feel like a second skin. Just make sure you buy the set with both hands clawed if that's the effect you're seeking; some pairs are on the market with only one clawed hand. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Edgewalker

customer_reviews.title: This set had the claws attached to the gloves which is much better than the other sets
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pair and another set with 4 pairs in it. This set had the claws attached to the gloves which is much better than the other sets. The claws were unattached. The first time I used them I lost the pinky claw several times while pulling weeds. These are much better. I wish I could return the others, but I already used them before I opened this one with the claws attached.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Prendergast

customer_reviews.title: Helpful product
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this as a gift for my mom who loves to garden and landscape. She loved it and using these gloves eliminated the need to carry and keep track of a hand rake. The claws are durable for digging in most natural materials or pinching off twigs/sprouts/weeds etc, however she lost one of the claws one day, as they will slip off from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: tvesi

customer_reviews.title: Great Garden Tool
customer_reviews.text: This product works great. It make digging up my potatoes even easier. They are even durable enough to get out most difficult weeds. Such a great tool themselfs that I hardly need to use my handheld tools any more. My hands are small and these fit a little loose. I find putting on a small cotton glove first helps my hand fit more snug.
customer_reviews.author: Tazzie

customer_reviews.title: They really work!
customer_reviews.text: I love that I have not had my usual garden glove issue of developing a hole in the index finger of my glove after a couple of wearings. It takes a little practice to get used to the claw fingers, but they are durable and really help dig in harder soil.
customer_reviews.author: Camella J. Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Don't know what to think
customer_reviews.text: These are not what you think. But will be great for a monster Halloween costume. When I open them my boyfriend and I laughed for a long time. I haven't tried them in the garden yet.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Not even CLOSE to fitting my small hands
customer_reviews.text: When it said one size fit "even big kids" and the fit was "like a second skin", I figured they must be very stretchy. My hands are small, but they're certainly larger than big kids' hands. These fit my husband, but they are pretty useless for me as I can't get any leverage on the tips.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves! Bought two more sets!
customer_reviews.text: These are great gloves for gardening. I use them all the time. And the claws on both hands are nice if you want to let someone use them. The only problem- when you are working having the claw on both hands kinda slows you down. I would say if you don't get these, get one with the claw on your non dominant hand.
customer_reviews.author: T. Gal

customer_reviews.title: Multipurpose Gloves
customer_reviews.text: Honestly my 9 year old son got more use out of these than I did. We planted some flowers and then he proceeded to use them as costume parts as any 9-year-old boy would probably do.
customer_reviews.author: Maryd2aTXN

customer_reviews.title: They are great for those not able to handle long rake and shovel handles.
customer_reviews.text: I like 'em! I don't handle rakes and shovels too well anymore, but I can reach down with these gloves and claw out those nasty weeds that are starting to choke my daylilies. That way, I don't damage the roots of the lilies, either. I liked getting gloves with claws on both hands; double action.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are great! They were shipped quickly and they were a ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great! They were shipped quickly and they were a gift for my favorite gardener, my mom. She has already tried them out and now I'm going to have to get a pair for myself! Tough fabric, won't get soaked, keeps your hands protected, and the best part? The tools are right at your fingertips!! I hate having to lug all my garden tools and I usually forget at least 1 spade or shovel. These will solve that problem! And the customer service is amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Emily McNeilly

customer_reviews.title: This is a Cheap Gimmick
customer_reviews.text: The plastic claws are glued on weakly and come off easily. Could be used in a halloween costume, but not for gardening.
customer_reviews.author: Hengine

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used them twice now cleaning up my yard and they’ve been life-changing. Work so well with gathering weeds and dead stuff, and also keep your hands from getting dirty! They are a little big, but my hands are too, so they work for me. :)
customer_reviews.author: Chrysanthemomma

customer_reviews.title: Integrity
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a Christmas gift for my mom she is now using and they broke after only one use. And now I am past time for a return. Don't buy as a gift. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Peck

customer_reviews.title: Look to be a good garden glove.
customer_reviews.text: I wont be able tobtruly try out these gloves for sevwral more weeks but they appear to be well made and I can see no reason why they would not work well in my flower gardens. They fit well and are comfortable. Cant wait to start digging this spring.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Shepard

customer_reviews.title: I am concerned about how well the plastic fingers are attached to the glove and that they potentially will fall off but so far they are great!
customer_reviews.text: Got them as a mother’s day gift and she loves them!! I am concerned about how well the plastic fingers are attached to the glove and that they potentially will fall off but so far they are great!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: claw gardening gloves
customer_reviews.text: I like being able to dig in the dirt with the gloves and move plants easily with them. I couldn't pick up anything else but plants with the gloves. I have to keep taking them off and on several times. Overall, I am please with the gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Scheryl

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: these gloves are amazing! my gardening time has been cut in half. they are comfortable and they work! i can alternate with either glove for planting and container filling with dirt, and i used both gloves for 'raking' and cleaning out my flower beds, spreading mulch, gathering pull up weeds, etc. best purchase for the avid gardener i've found! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: KBrown

customer_reviews.title: These would work better on someone with like size XXL hands
customer_reviews.text: These would work better if they weren't huge and baggy on the hands - and I have large hands. Is very hard to actually position these so that you can get a good dig with the claws.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great concept, BUT
customer_reviews.text: Great concept, BUT...until smaller sizes are offered, they will NOT work for smaller hands! The lack of control defeats the design...ALSO, I ordered a right AND left pair both clawed set, and instead received two left clawed gloved...really doesNOT work for a right handed person. This product needs improvement AND order control!
customer_reviews.author: Michele A., Curlee

customer_reviews.title: really work!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves look totally silly, but they really work! The only drawback is that if you have long(ish) finger nails they are a little uncomfortable. Nevertheless, they really DO work!
customer_reviews.author: jane

customer_reviews.title: Great idea!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT idea!! Unfortunately, they are way too big for my hands. Great for a man, but not for me. I'm hoping they make a smaller size soon! I think they would be very helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Pat H

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I was going to give these gloves a full 5 stars until the second time I used them the finger claw on the right glove broke off. I could accept it had it happened to the left glove - my dominant hand but not the right.
customer_reviews.author: CAHummingbird

customer_reviews.title: Amazing gloves
customer_reviews.text: These gloves have changed my life, they help so much with planting the gardens I work with to the point of making it almost too easy.
customer_reviews.author: Irves

customer_reviews.title: He had fun with them until the black tips fell off the ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son to play in the dirt with. He had fun with them until the black tips fell off the ends of several fingers. It happened pretty quickly, too. Granted he is a 10 year old boy who may have been a little rougher with them than the average user, but wish they had lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Great as gardener gift. My daughter said keeps fingernails. Worked well.
customer_reviews.text: Used to repot flowers in bigger pots. fits nice good material. Easy to loosen dirt.Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: sue Hopper

customer_reviews.title: Not great for everyday gardening, and some manufacturing defects, but very cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is a clever design, and they are very cute, but one of the finger tips popped off shortly after I started using it. These gloves are probably best for people who are digging through the dirt a lot, and not as good for routine gardening.
customer_reviews.author: rembrandt

customer_reviews.title: broke within 2 weeks of low usage.
customer_reviews.text: I thought the idea on these was okay. The claws make it kind of hard to do much of anything but dig, and then they all broke within 2 weeks of low usage.
customer_reviews.author: Us Moore

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, but sticky fingers
customer_reviews.text: I love these gloves, but the only problem is if I forget and leave them outisde and they get wet, the latex coating tends to get sticky.
customer_reviews.author: DCG

customer_reviews.title: I never knew how badly I needed these
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for those leaves stuck at the base of your shrubs (yep, the ones that have been there for 5 years...)
customer_reviews.author: Kristi C

customer_reviews.title: works well, I can now trim my roses without ...
customer_reviews.text: works well, I can now trim my roses without much fear of the thorns... long thorns can still pierce through, but it has to be REALLY long ones
customer_reviews.author: JeniT

customer_reviews.title: Great claw!
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses these in her garden and flower beds... absolutely loves them. Great idea for clawing at even the hardest of dirt!
customer_reviews.author: Ron L.

customer_reviews.title: Super cool!
customer_reviews.text: These are so cool! Makes gardening so much easier. Down side, a little big for my small hands but the wrist bands hold them on. I already bought 2 more for friends!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L.

customer_reviews.title: Transaction went just fine. Glove pair is exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Transaction went just fine. Glove pair is exactly as described. I have small hands so gloves are a bit big and awkward, but they definitely work.
customer_reviews.author: P. Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I had to glue one of the claws back on, but, no big deal. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Lintner

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy!
customer_reviews.text: I just started gardening so I didnt really know what to expect, but they've lasted great from the very first day I got them until now and they're still going strong. I really enjoy them and have a lot of fun using them to plant new bundles of flowers - I feel like a badger, its great.
customer_reviews.author: Mika

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: They work very well. The claw are study and help to dig the little holes needed to plant seeds. Also they help me to dig through my compost.
customer_reviews.author: alexis turner

customer_reviews.title: Love these gloves!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best gloves for ‘waking the garden up’ in the spring. Cleaning around tender perennials with winter debris or just loosening the soil around them. This is my second purchase - and I’m buying them for a gardening friend!
customer_reviews.author: Janice Travis

customer_reviews.title: love them
customer_reviews.text: I bought these not sure if it was a good thing but I just love them very easy to use and very sturdy shared, these with a friend and she loves them as well I highly recommend the gloves
customer_reviews.author: hazel k romer

customer_reviews.title: My Mom loved these!!!
customer_reviews.text: My Mom's face really lit up when she saw these in her present box. I haven't used them myself but I think she'll get a lot of use out of them!
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Almost a genius idea
customer_reviews.text: These would be better if the forefinger didn't have a claw. It's really hard to grip a weed to pull it out with a thumb and claw.
customer_reviews.author: David Miller

customer_reviews.title: I haven't tried it yet. The plastic tips are ...
customer_reviews.text: Update. I contacted the company and they replaced the gloves politely and quickly. The new ones are great. I haven't tried it yet. The plastic tips are glued on in some way. One of them fell off as soon as I took it out of the box. Question the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Pebbles

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are perfect for the gardener. They work very well and are exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Hildy Hyland

customer_reviews.title: Xmas present!
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a present for my mom for her gardening & she absolutely loves them! They fit super well & hold up & she does intense gardening!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Mahowald

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE! They are tough and absolutely perfect for ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THESE! They are tough and absolutely perfect for gardening. I threw them in my washer and they came out perfectly clean and unscathed. I won't garden without them!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: awesome back scratchers! LOL- will get used alot in the garden!
customer_reviews.author: Becki M

customer_reviews.title: New gloves are great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Could hardly wait for my garden gloves to arrive. I bought my flowers so I would be ready when my new gloves arrived. I received my new gloves and was delighted with them. They were easy to use and they worked great. I am completely satisfied with them I think you will be, too.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Norvell

customer_reviews.title: BUY THESE!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I am disabled and have to sit to do any gardening...when I saw these, I have to try them. Not only do they keep my hands and nails clean, but they work superbly! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for my garden
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for my garden. I love these. it makes it easy to transition from planting jobs and they work wonderfully
customer_reviews.author: MegjgeM

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good effort to provide diggers for the hands. Hope that they last more than a few times
customer_reviews.author: Brenda S.

customer_reviews.title: Fits large hands
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband who has large hands. The gloves are very stretchy and fit his hands very well. He loves them. They make digging through the soil much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Egyud

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, and efficient
customer_reviews.text: Handy, comfortable, and efficient. I still have another pair of garden gloves as sometimes the claws are unnecessary and can get in the way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy garden genie gloves
customer_reviews.text: The finger tips fall off and not a good value
customer_reviews.author: Michele king

customer_reviews.title: These work great in the garden
customer_reviews.text: Wow. These work great in the garden. No more dirt under my fingernails!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I feel like you need to make a metal version so it would have more digging power.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought two pair of these for gardening enthusiast on my shopping list...I think they'll get a lot of use!

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Clumsy, only works in soft dirt or sand. Don’t work by rose thrones
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Nallo

customer_reviews.title: Design is GREAT, constructed Extremely Cheap..
customer_reviews.text: They work great, awesome idea, however Im glad I bought a warranty, seems to be of very low quality..
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: These gloves have been great, digging in the dirt and breaking up soil. Added bonus, my dogs like them for back scratchers.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Mower

customer_reviews.title: These gloves are awesome for all the gardening i did at my family’s ...
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are awesome for all the gardening i did at my family’s home. I need another pair for my own.
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: fabulous idea for people who love to get their hands in th dirt and plant ...
customer_reviews.text: fabulous idea for people who love to get their hands in th dirt and plant keeps fingernails clen
customer_reviews.author: Bonbon M.

customer_reviews.title: All gardeners need these!
customer_reviews.text: These are great!!! Arrived quickly and perfect for all the weeding I'm doing. Recommend to all gardeners.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Garden Gloves
customer_reviews.text: They are gifts for two women who are difficult to buy for. Not sure what they will think of them, but hey both love to dig around in their flower beds.
customer_reviews.author: bkpr2007

customer_reviews.title: Broke after using less than 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.text: Returned these because the tip on one of the fingers fell off after using these gloves for less than 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela J Shoberg

customer_reviews.title: Useful!
customer_reviews.text: These are so handy, I had to get a couple of pairs to share with my gardening friends.
customer_reviews.author: Peep

customer_reviews.title: Fits comfortably
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, fits snugly and will be of great use in gardening.
customer_reviews.author: Ranel K

customer_reviews.title: Badger!
customer_reviews.text: I think you really only need one with claws (the dominant hand) but I had to try them both! I love these things, super effective!
customer_reviews.author: J. Garland

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my mother in law who is an avid gardener, and she loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole L. Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They really do replace the need for a tool when digging out plants and their root systems.

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: They are great for digging, very durable even in clay or rocky dirt.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They do what the ad Says, but are aggravating to use

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: During first use with these one of the tips broke off. So it appears they can only be used in soft soil with out any roots or rocks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to scratch my dog's butt... he loves them. A lot.

customer_reviews.title: Great gardening gloves + Monster playtime
customer_reviews.text: They look so weird, but work really well to help you dig up things in the garden. The biggest problem is the kids steal them to play monster LOL!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent invention. Cant wait to plant my tomatoes. Makes gardening fun and easy. They should come in Sizes
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: great garden gloves
customer_reviews.text: Great for doing surface digging around a plant. Probably still would need a trowel to dig a hole. The gloves are easy to get on and off and keep your hands clean. They are flexible enough so you can handle and use most tools and items. On another note, my grandkids confiscated them to play dragons. I ordered five more pair, so they could all have a set and they are thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: Ckacin

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: trying to use the "claws" hurts my fingertips and they don't stay steady
customer_reviews.author: K. M. L. R.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: You have to have very long fingers in order fir those to work. Otherwise you're finger joints will prevent you from being able to bend your fingers to dig.
customer_reviews.author: Ada Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: I easily weeded my garden with just these gloves
customer_reviews.text: I have small hands, so they are a bit big, but they really work!!! I easily weeded my garden with just these gloves... no need for tools.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Garden Genie gloves a must have for the gardener!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these gloves. I do a lot of re-potting and other gardening and these are a must have for someone like me who likes to dig in with her hands!!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Marie Banta

customer_reviews.title: Very useful!
customer_reviews.text: These are very handy and useful gloves. I have enjoyed saving my fingernails.

customer_reviews.title: Work pretty well.
customer_reviews.text: These work pretty well. They are hot, but any of this kind would be.

customer_reviews.title: Instead I think these would make a good addition to a halloween costume
customer_reviews.text: My intentions for these gloves were for what they were intended. Gardening or picking out earwax. Instead I think these would make a good addition to a halloween costume.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: 1st nice day and wore these gloves all day. Really work get and comfortable

customer_reviews.title: Great Gardening Tool!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tried these yet, as it's still Winter. But, they seem very well made and I can't wait to get em dirty!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Ponce

customer_reviews.title: Use in potting soil mixtures
customer_reviews.text: I used my gloves in my window boxes, and they were great for soil mixes like potting soil. They will not work in hard soil.

customer_reviews.title: More then gardening
customer_reviews.text: The heck with the garden, they are great for back scratching

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Work really well for digging in the dirt and raking leaves together in a pile to pick up.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Very durable and I think it can last for a very long time

customer_reviews.title: These are great for doing yard gardening
customer_reviews.text: These are great for doing yard gardening. Also found they are very useful in cleaning grass out from under my push mower

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of the claws broke within the first 24 hours of using them.

customer_reviews.title: They are great !!
customer_reviews.text: I liked not having to dig with a tool. They are a little hard to pick thing up with these on.

customer_reviews.title: They are a Great help for planting and cleaning up your garden
customer_reviews.text: These glove do what they say. They are a Great help for planting and cleaning up your garden.

customer_reviews.title: You will love these garden gloves
customer_reviews.text: I love these gloves! Good quality material and the claws work perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super clever and useful gloves. Will definitely buy another pair!!

product_meta.title: Garden Genie Gloves, Inf-way Both Hand Claws Gardening Gloves, Quick & Easy to Dig & Plant, Safe for Rose Pruning - As Seen On TV (Right + Left Claw 1 pair)

Best gloves for the garden and are also able to used for protection around the household, auto and more Perfect addition to your gardening tools and gardening supples They make a great gardening gift for your gardener friend or family member! Package Including: 1 pair of garden gloves with both right and left handed claws packed in Gift Box
